sense.gloss: background, behind the scenes, behind someone's back
gloom (in someone's expression, nature, etc.), darkness
conspiracy, agreement between two or more people to commit an unlawful act
cosmic dual forces, yin and yang, sun and moon, etc.
place in the shade of a mountain, shelter of the mountains
malicious, spiteful, vicious, wicked, devious, underhanded, sly
malicious gossip, backbiting, speaking ill behind someone's back
shadow (e.g. on someone's happiness), cloud, shade, gloom
place hidden from view, cover, shelter, hiding place
hidden place, unseen part, private location
crafty, tricky, sly, wily, treacherous, underhand
red candlestick (in a candlestick chart), bearish candlestick
secretly (cheer, pray, etc. for someone), in secret, from the sidelines, at a distance
lion at home but weakling elsewhere
Onmyōdō, way of Yin and Yang, occult divination system based on the Taoist theory of the five elements

sdata.j: ↑空↑↓そら↓はどんよりとした↑冬↑↓ふゆ↓の↑陰↑↓かげ↓にかすんでいる。
sdata.e: The sky is a hazy shade of winter.

sdata.j: ↑強盗↑↓ごうとう↓↑達↑↓たち↓が↑木陰↑↓こかげ↓から↑出↑↓で↓てきて↑彼↑↓かれ↓に↑襲↑↓おそ↓い↑掛↑↓か↓かった。
sdata.e: The robbers fell upon him from behind the trees.

sdata.j: ↑寄↑↓よ↓らば↑大樹↑↓たいじゅ↓の↑陰↑↓かげ↓。
sdata.e: When you take shelter, make sure you go under a big tree.

sdata.j: ↑我々↑↓われわれ↓は↑夜陰↑↓やいん↓に↑乗↑↓じょう↓じて↑進↑↓すす↓んだ。
sdata.e: We advanced under cover of darkness.

sdata.j: ↑火事↑↓かじ↓を↑起↑↓お↓こすという↑彼↑↓かれ↓らの↑陰謀↑↓いんぼう↓は↑警察↑↓けいさつ↓に↑発見↑↓はっけん↓された。
sdata.e: Their plot to start a fire was discovered by the police.

sdata.j: ↑陰↑↓かげ↓で↑他↑↓ほか↓の↑人↑↓ひと↓の↑悪口↑↓わるぐち↓を↑言↑↓い↓ってはならない。
sdata.e: We must not speak ill of others behind their backs.

sdata.j: ↑雲↑↓くも↓の↑陰↑↓かげ↓に↑隠↑↓かく↓れて↑月↑↓つき↓は↑見↑↓み↓えません。
sdata.e: The moon is invisible behind the clouds.

sdata.j: ↑雨↑↓あめ↓が↑降↑↓ふ↓って、その↑秋↑↓あき↓の↑日↑↓ひ↓を↑陰↑↓いん↓うつにした。
sdata.e: The rain made the autumn day dismal.

sdata.j: ↑陰徳↑↓いんとく↓あれば↑陽報↑↓ようほう↓あり。
sdata.e: Secret gifts are openly rewarded.

sdata.j: ↑陰険↑↓いんけん↓な↑奴↑↓やつ↓。
sdata.e: You are a snake!

sdata.j: ↑陰口↑↓かげぐち↓を↑言↑↓い↓われるのが↑好↑↓す↓きな↑人↑↓ひと↓はいない。
sdata.e: Nobody likes being spoken ill of behind his back.

sdata.j: ↑陰↑↓かげ↓で↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑悪口↑↓わるぐち↓を↑言↑↓い↓うな。
sdata.e: Don't speak badly of him in his absence.

sdata.j: ↑人↑↓ひと↓の↑陰口↑↓かげぐち↓を↑言↑↓い↓ってはいけない。
sdata.e: You should not speak ill of others behind their backs.

sdata.j: ↑陰↑↓かげ↓で↑他人↑↓たにん↓の↑悪口↑↓わるぐち↓を↑言↑↓い↓うべきでない。
sdata.e: You should not speak ill of others behind their backs.

sdata.j: ↑陰↑↓かげ↓で↑人↑↓ひと↓の↑話↑↓はなし↓をしてはいけないよ。
sdata.e: You should not speak about others behind their backs.

sdata.j: ↑他人↑↓たにん↓の↑陰口↑↓かげぐち↓をたたくな。
sdata.e: Don't speak ill of others behind their back.

sdata.j: ↑人↑↓ひと↓の↑陰↑↓かげ↓で↑悪口↑↓わるぐち↓を↑言↑↓い↓うな。
sdata.e: Don't speak ill of others behind their back.

sdata.j: ↑陰↑↓かげ↓で↑人↑↓ひと↓の↑悪口↑↓わるぐち↓を↑言↑↓い↓ってはいけない。
sdata.e: Don't speak ill of others behind their back.

sdata.j: ↑陰↑↓かげ↓で↑人↑↓ひと↓のうわさをするべきでない。
sdata.e: You shouldn't talk about people behind their backs.

sdata.j: ↑一↑↓ひと↓↑人↑↓り↓の↑老人↑↓ろうじん↓が↑木陰↑↓こかげ↓で↑休↑↓やす↓んでいた。
sdata.e: An old man was at rest under the tree.

sdata.j: その↑子↑↓こ↓は↑大↑↓おお↓きな↑木↑↓き↓の↑陰↑↓かげ↓に↑隠↑↓かく↓れていた。
sdata.e: The child was hiding behind a big tree.

sdata.j: とても↑暑↑↓あつ↓かったので↑日陰↑↓ひかげ↓に↑入↑↓はい↓って↑休↑↓やす↓んだ。
sdata.e: It was so hot that I got into the shade and took a rest.

sdata.j: ドアの↑陰↑↓かげ↓から↑男↑↓おとこ↓が↑現↑↓あらわ↓れた。
sdata.e: A man appeared from behind the door.

sdata.j: ドアの↑陰↑↓かげ↓から↑変↑↓へん↓な↑音↑↓おと↓が↑聞↑↓き↓こえた。
sdata.e: A strange sound was heard from behind the door.

sdata.j: ツベルクリン↑反応↑↓はんのう↓は↑陰性↑↓いんせい↓でした。
sdata.e: The result of the tuberculin test was negative.

sdata.j: だれか↑人↑↓ひと↓に、↑言↑↓い↓い↑分↑↓ぶん↓があったら、↑陰口↑↓かげぐち↓をいわないで、その↑人↑↓ひと↓に↑面↑↓めん↓と↑向↑↓む↓かっていいなさい。
sdata.e: If you have a bone to pick with a person, tell it to his face instead of saying things behind his back.

sdata.j: ↑人↑↓ひと↓に↑文句↑↓もんく↓があるなら↑陰口↑↓かげぐち↓を↑言↑↓い↓うのではなく、↑相手↑↓あいて↓に↑面↑↓めん↓と↑向↑↓む↓かって↑言↑↓い↓いなさい。
sdata.e: If you have a bone to pick with a person, tell it to his face instead of saying things behind his back.

sdata.j: だれがそのたくらみの↑陰↑↓かげ↓にいるのだ。
sdata.e: Who is behind the plot?

sdata.j: ためらうことなく、その↑陰謀↑↓いんぼう↓にたいする↑徹底↑↓てってい↓した↑対抗↑↓たいこう↓↑処置↑↓しょち↓をとった。
sdata.e: Without a moment's hesitation, they took drastic action against the conspiracy.

sdata.j: その↑木↑↓き↓の↑木陰↑↓こかげ↓で↑寝↑↓ね↓るのは↑気持↑↓きも↓ちいい。
sdata.e: It is pleasant to sleep under the tree.
